short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads recipes from websites and summarizes them using ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reading through recipe websites can feel like a marathon 🏃 

Here's Recipe GPT 🍲!

Recipe GPT intelligently scans a webpage 📖, extracting the essence - the recipe 📝.

It efficiently condenses the information into a neat list of ingredients 🥦🍞🧀 and easy-to-follow instructions 🗒️.

And the cherry on the cake 🍒🍰? Each handpicked recipe is automatically saved 🗂️ and added to your personal collection 📚, streamlining your culinary journey 🛤️.

Kick the clutter to the curb and embrace simplicity with Recipe GPT - your ultimate kitchen companion for stress-free cooking 🍳!
